Control Name: 4.9. Ensure that 'Data encryption' is set to 'On' on a SQL Database
Control Statement: Azure SQL Database transparent data encryption helps protect against the threat of malicious activity by performing real-time encryption and decryption of the database, associated backups, and transaction log files at rest without requiring changes to the application.
